title: Canyonlands National Park: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit        Hiking in The Needles NPS/Andrew Kuhn   Â    Canyonlands is divided into four districts by the massive canyons of the Green and Colorado rivers. From accessible views at Island in the Sky or rambling trails in The Needles, to deep remoteness of The Maze or even floating the rivers themselves: whatever you choose, Canyonlands offers a lifetime of exploration possibilities. Basic Information Find out about Operating Hours, Weather, and Current Conditions Directions & Transportation Directions to the different districts in Canyonlands. Eating & Sleeping Learn about park campgrounds. (There are no restaurants or lodges in Canyonlands.)  Places to Go Learn more about the different districts of Canyonlands.  Things To Do Explore the many activities that are possible in the park. Trip Itineraries How should you spend your visit? Safety  Important tips on staying safe in remote desert places. Park Regulations What's required or prohibited at Canyonlands? Publications Read and download maps and brochures. The park Calendar, Nearby Attractions, and Accessibility pages might help you make the most of your visit. You can also connect to the park and get help planning your trip via our social media sites, including Facebook, Twitter, YouTube and more.
